statements: SELECT * FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name, cost FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis;
SELECT intervention_name, outcome FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE outcome = 'Positive';
SELECT intervention_name, cost FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE outcome = 'Success' ORDER BY intervention_name;
SELECT intervention_name, cost FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost < 5000 AND outcome LIKE 'Effect%' ORDER BY cost ASC;
SELECT intervention_name, cost, outcome FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, outcome FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis WHERE cost = (SELECT MIN(cost) FROM cost_effectiveness_analysis);
SELECT * FROM CostData;
SELECT intervention_id, cost FROM CostData ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT intervention_id, outcome_result FROM OutcomeData WHERE intervention_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM OutcomeData WHERE trial_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT intervention_id, outcome_result FROM OutcomeData ORDER BY intervention_id ASC, outcome_result DESC;
SELECT * FROM CostData WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY intervention_id ASC
SELECT intervention_id, cost, outcome FROM CostData WHERE outcome = 'success' ORDER BY intervention_id DESC
SELECT intervention_id, cost, outcome, outcome_result FROM CostData JOIN OutcomeData ON CostData.intervention_id = OutcomeData.intervention_id WHERE outcome_result = 'positive' ORDER BY cost DESC

SELECT intervention_id, cost, outcome, outcome_result, outcome_measure FROM CostData JOIN OutcomeData ON CostData.intervention_id = OutcomeData.intervention_id WHERE cost < 500 AND outcome = 'failure' ORDER BY outcome_measure ASC

SELECT intervention_id, cost, outcome, outcome_result, outcome_measure FROM CostData JOIN OutcomeData ON CostData.intervention_id = OutcomeData.intervention_id WHERE outcome_measure = 'pain reduction' AND cost BETWEEN 200 AND 500 ORDER BY cost ASC
SELECT * FROM cost_data;
SELECT cost_id, cost_amount, cost_date FROM cost_data;
SELECT intervention_id, cost_amount FROM cost_data ORDER BY cost_amount DESC;
SELECT intervention_id, cost_amount FROM cost_data WHERE cost_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM outcome_data WHERE outcome_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cost_data WHERE cost_amount > 1000 ORDER BY cost_date DESC
SELECT cost_id, cost_amount FROM cost_data WHERE intervention_id = 3 AND cost_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT AVG(cost_amount) AS average_cost, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM cost_data GROUP BY intervention_id HAVING num_records > 5
SELECT MAX(outcome_value) AS max_outcome_value, intervention_id FROM outcome_data GROUP BY intervention_id ORDER BY max_outcome_value DESC
SELECT t.trial_id, t.trial_location, c.cost_amount FROM clinical_trials t JOIN cost_data c ON t.intervention_id = c.intervention_id WHERE t.trial_start_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM cost_data;
SELECT study_id, cost FROM cost_data ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, cost FROM cost_data WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT * FROM trial_results WHERE effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name, description FROM intervention_details;
SELECT * FROM cost_data WHERE cost > 100 ORDER BY intervention_name DESC, study_id ASC;
SELECT study_id, intervention_name, cost FROM cost_data WHERE intervention_name LIKE 'A%' AND outcome_data IS NOT NULL ORDER BY cost DESC;

SELECT trial_results.result_id, trial_results.effectiveness, cost_effectiveness.cost_effectiveness_ratio FROM trial_results INNER JOIN cost_effectiveness ON trial_results.result_id = cost_effectiveness.result_id WHERE trial_results.study_id = 5 ORDER BY cost_effectiveness.cost_effectiveness_ratio ASC;
SELECT intervention_id, intervention_name, description FROM intervention_details WHERE description LIKE '%effective%' ORDER BY intervention_id ASC;

SELECT intervention_name, cost_effectiveness_ratio FROM intervention_details INNER JOIN cost_effectiveness ON intervention_details.intervention_id = cost_effectiveness.intervention_id WHERE cost_effectiveness_ratio < 1.0 ORDER BY intervention_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CostData;
SELECT patient_id, cost FROM CostData ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT intervention_name, duration_days FROM InterventionDetails WHERE intervention_type='Surgery';
SELECT patient_id, age, gender, ethnicity FROM PatientDetails WHERE age > 50;
SELECT intervention_id, effect_size, p_value FROM OutcomeData WHERE p_value < 0.05 ORDER BY effect_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM CostData WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY patient_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, intervention_id, outcome FROM CostData JOIN OutcomeData ON CostData.patient_id = OutcomeData.patient_id WHERE effect_size > 0.5;
SELECT PatientDetails.patient_id, age, gender, InterventionDetails.intervention_name FROM PatientDetails JOIN InterventionDetails ON PatientDetails.patient_id = InterventionDetails.intervention_id;
SELECT intervention_id, AVG(cost) AS avg_cost FROM CostData GROUP BY intervention_id HAVING AVG(cost) > 5000 ORDER BY avg_cost DESC;
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date, researcher_name FROM TrialInfo WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
